Interface EnergyManagerComponentAccessI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnergyManager

    public interface EnergyManagerComponentAccessI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.EmbeddingComponentAccessI
    The class EnergyManagerComponentAccessI declares the methods an energy manager must implement.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2020-01-21

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void controlTask(double simulatedTime)
      activated at a fixed period, this task gets the current global electricity consumption, takes decisions and enforce them to manage the energy in the house/flat.
      double getControlPeriod()
      return the control task activation period.
